Hi all

I need to test JSP and Servlets in my project.
Which is/are the best tool(s) to use ? And how long it takes to set 
them up and customise for your needs ?

Also I downloaded junit 3.7 but I couldn't find TestRunner along with 
that . Any idea as to where I can get TestRunner from ?

Thanks in advance
Anand
